title: SOLD: Mathewson Dark Cap - Sovereign Back

posts.post_title: SOLD: Mathewson Dark Cap - Sovereign Back
posts.post_content:
Pains me to sell this, as it was my first t206, but need the funds to buy another t206. SGC10, Sovereign Back. Asking $SOLD

Will take picture of the back later today when I'm back at home.

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/charleybrown/my-collection/17192/1910-t206-christy-mathewson[/IMG]
